name: Aiko3993's Sideload Source (NSFW)
subtitle: Supports AltStore, SideStore & LiveContainer
description: A collection of adult-themed sideloadable apps for iOS and iPadOS. Supports AltStore, SideStore, and LiveContainer.

apps.name: LoveIwara
apps.versionDescription:
ğŸš€ Release Notes for Version 0.4.1


ğŸ”¥ New Features

 Smarter Edge Gesture Handling: Optimized the player's edge swipe behavior to better distinguish between system gestures (status bar pull-down, full-screen back gesture, etc.) and in-app horizontal/vertical gestures, reducing accidental operations in the player (Issue 69).
 Download List Enhancements:
   Local Playback Entry: Videos in the download list can now be opened directly as local files within the app.
   UI Polish: Refined the layout and interaction of the download list to make status and actions clearer.
 Desktop Drag-and-Drop Playback: On desktop platforms, you can drag video files from a folder onto the app icon or directly into the app window to start playback immediately.  
  _Note: Linux is currently untested and this feature is not guaranteed to be available or work correctly._
 System â€œOpen with â†’ i_iwaraâ€ Support: On both desktop and mobile platforms, you can use the system's â€œOpen with â†’ i_iwaraâ€ action to launch the app and play local video files.  
  _Note: iOS and Linux are currently untested and this feature is not guaranteed to be available or work correctly._
 Windows Installer: Windows builds now provide an installer (installer), so you no longer need to manually extract zip packages and replace folders.
 Local Favorites Drag-and-Drop Sorting: The local favorites list now supports drag-and-drop sorting, making it easier to organize your favorite content.


ğŸ›  Optimizations

 Gallery Viewing Experience:
   When viewing large images, the viewer now preloads 3 images in advance to provide smoother browsing for posts with many pictures.
   When the current item is a video file in the large-image viewer, the volume swipe-to-change-page gesture is disabled so that you can adjust the volume normally without interference.
 Stability Improvements:
   Rolled back the Flutter version to improve app stability on some systems.


ğŸ“¢ How to Provide Feedback

 Leave a comment in the GitHub issues section
 Or join the discussion group

Your feedback is extremely valuable to us. Thank you for your continued support and help! ğŸš€


---
